item.title: Welcome to My DevOps Journey
item.description: Introduction I’m a System Administrator venturing into the world of DevOps, and this blog will document my learning journey. As someone who’s spent time managing traditional infrastructure, I’m excited to share my experiences as I explore modern DevOps practices and tools. What to Expect This blog will focus on practical tutorials and real-world examples covering: Container orchestration with Docker and Kubernetes Automation with Ansible CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins Version control with GitHub Infrastructure as Code Cloud platforms and services

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Looth Ibrahim - DevOps Engineer and System Administrator
